title: [Mac] Unable to get full screen on my external display on version 7.1 !
body:
Hi,

I'm using 15 inch MacBook Pro, with LOL client version 7.1.17,  and mac os 10.11

All working good with the build-in 15 inch display. But if I use my 25 inch external display, I can't get full screen!

I tried alt+enter, but it only gives me a windowed version

How can I solve this issue?

Thanks

replies.body: Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look and help individually.  The full screen issue should now be resolved, so we'd like to look in cases where the issue might still be occurring.  We'll reply back asap!
